content.description:
Eli Buzzell notes that : " This wall is the essentially same wall as Stinger wall, which is where the routes are posted".

 Sykes shows that as a separate sub-area on his Kinsman map, but no climbs are listed in the guidebook.  

 There is a climb named "4/20" ( 5.8+, 140 ft "longest climb at this crag" ) listed under Stinger crag in the guidebook, but it hasn't yet been posted to mtnproject.

 I'll keep this a sub-area for now, but be aware it might be a "Psyko" (Pun on "Typo" !...DUH !)  R Hall NH Admin.
